name: LEGO Batman 2 Game Save File
summary: A LEGOBATMAN2SAVEGAMEDATA file is a data file that stores information about a saved game created by the Windows version of LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes. It contains a player's game progress, which includes completed missions, unlocked characters and suits, and earned gold bricks. Most players will never encounter LEGOBATMAN2SAVEGAMEDATA files unless they attempt to transfer saved games from one computer to another.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
